command:
cd /result && tensorboard --logdir . &      export VMPC_DATA_DIR=/mnt/pushing_data;     export TEN_DATA=/mnt/tensorflow_data;     export ALEX_DATA=/mnt/pretrained_models;     export RESULT_DIR=/result; cd /workspace/video_prediction; git checkout dev; git pull;cd /workspace/video_prediction/docker;CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES=0 python ../scripts/train.py  --conf ../pretrained_models/sawyer_sim/autograsp_bowl  --train_batch_sizes 8 8 \

              /data/autograsp_bowls/bad \
  --dataset cartgripper --model savp \
  --dataset_hparams image_view=0 --model_hparams kl_weight=1e-5 --logs_dir /result
